Package fun.connor.lighter.compiler.validators

Provides simple annotation validators for all Lighter annotations

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AnnotationValidatorFactory<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Function interface used to construct AnnotationValidator instances.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnnotationValidator<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    Utility class for implementing Validatable for validation individual annotations
    AnnotationValidatorMap
    Lookup table for annotation validators based on annotation type.
    EndpointAnnotationValidator<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation>
    AnnotationValidator implementation for Lighter Endpoint Annotations.
    LocationValidator
    External validator for annotations that ensures they are placed in a legal location.
    LocationValidator.Builder  
    LocationValidator.Predicates  
    ResourceControllerValidator
    AnnotationValidator implementation which validates ResourceController annotations.

Package fun.connor.lighter.compiler.validators Description
